objects.name: Info
objects.string:
Click any acts to play.
Act 1 is the first act, recommended.

content.text:
Click any acts to play.
Act 1 is the first act, recommended.

objects.name: NewText
objects.string:
This game is based on characters and concepts from Demonophobia created by Window Frame(237). Monsters from Demonophobia were created by -3째C.

Please note that this game is supposedly a reboot, due to a new character replacing protagonist.

Original characters were made by 732, but Unnamed Antagonist were kept.
